meta.title: City Academy | A Charter School in St. Paul, Minnesota

div.p: City Academy High School is a public charter school in Saint Paul, Minnesota. We were the first charter school to begin operation in the country. Our students have typically experienced challenges in traditional academic settings. We focus on providing opportunities for our students to either attend postsecondary institutions or begin employment. Our school shares facilities with a neighborhood recreation center, and utilizes community resources as much as possible. Please contact us with any questions.

***City Academy will be closed for classes from noon on Monday, March 16 through Friday, April 3, in accordance with the Governor's Emergency Order and our normally scheduled Spring Break. Beginning on April 6 and continuing through May 4, City Academy will implement our Distance Learning Plan, as directed by Governor Walz.
As always, students should contact their advisors for more information. Please contact us, or continue to check our website for updates.
© 2020 City Academy | 958 Jessie Street, Saint Paul MN 55130 | Phone: 651-298-4624

The information on this website is available in alternative formats, and auxiliary aids and services are available upon request to individuals with disabilities. City Academy does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities. The school Director has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies at the address and phone listed above.
